title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5018 - Actuarial Assumptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5018 - Actuarial Assumptions

State Regulations
§ 5018.1 - Valuation rate of interest, salary scale and COLA assumptions
§ 5018.2 - Mortality and service tables for valuation purposes
§ 5018.3 - Mortality tables for the determination of benefits accrued prior to August 1, 1983
§ 5018.4 - Mortality tables for the determination of benefits accruing on or after August 1, 1983
§ 5018.5 - Interest rate for calculation of service retirement benefit
§ 5018.6 - Compliance with IRC section 415

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5018

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 501[9][b]-[c], 504[1], 508 [4], 517

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
